ProjectTitle: Beneficial effects of cannabidiol on muscle recovery, sleep and exercise performance in athletes; beyond the hype
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/04/2024
Ethics: for clinical research and the use of human bodily material you need approval from the UZ Leuven ethical committee instead of PRET/SMEC, please have a look at the flowchart on https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/index to learn where to apply, and make sure to have approval before you start working with the volunteers
Sharing: When sharing data under access restrictions you can't choose a license but you will need a data transfer agreement that the RDR team and legal department will write with you when someone request the data
label: good with suggestions
